text: Funda Nakkaşoğlu (born 22 September 1995) is an Australian-Turkish basketball player. ==College== Nakkaşoğlu began her college career at Utah State University in Logan, Utah for the Aggies. After two seasons with the Aggies, Nakkaşoğlu transferred to the University of Florida in Gainesville, Florida where she would now play for the Gators for the remaining two years of her playing eligibility. ==Career== ===WNBL=== Nakkaşoğlu began her career signing on an amateur contract with the Bulleen Boomers for the 2012–13 season. In 2020, Nakkaşoğlu signed with the Sydney Uni Flames for the 2020–21 season. This marks her first time playing in Australia & the WNBL since 2013. ===Turkey=== Nakkaşoğlu will begin her professional career in the TKBL after signing with Galatasaray S.K.. She will be playing alongside the likes of Işıl Alben and Victoria Macaulay. ==National team== ===Senior Level=== At the age of 20, Nakkaşoğlu was invited to attend Turkey's national team camp ahead of their Olympic campaign. Despite growing up and playing in Australia, Nakkaşoğlu was eligible for the team given her dual passports due to her parents Turkish background. Nakkaşoğlu was not named to the final roster however has continued to hold a place in the Turkish squad. ==References== Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:Turkish women's basketball players Category:Australian women's basketball players Category:Turkish expatriate basketball people in the United States Category:Australian expatriate basketball people in the United States Category:Basketball players at the 2017 NCAA Division I Women's Final Four Category:Guards (basketball) Category:Florida Gators women's basketball players
title: Funda Nakkaşoğlu
